verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5750>Yet<s%> will I <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5061>plague<s%> more on <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and on <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H310>afterwards<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he will let you <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2088>hence:<s%> when he shall let you <S%H7971>go,<s%> he shall surely <S%H1644>thrust<s%> you out <S%H2088>hence<s%> <S%H3617>altogether.<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and let every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>borrow<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and every <S%H802>woman<s%> of her <S%H7468>neighbor,<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>and <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%> <S%H1571>Moreover<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> About <S%H2676>midnight<s%> <S%H3915><s%> will I <S%H3318>go<s%> out into the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall <S%H4191>die,<s%> from the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> that <S%H3427>sits<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> even to the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H8198>maidservant<s%> that is <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H7347>mill;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H929>beasts.<s%>

And there shall be a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6818>cry<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H834>such<s%> as there was <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> it, <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall be <S%H3644>like<s%> it <S%H3254>any<s%> <S%H3254>more.<s%>

But against <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall not a <S%H3611>dog<s%> <S%H2782>move<s%> his <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> against <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5704>or<s%> <S%H929>beast:<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> how that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> does put a <S%H6395>difference<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to me, and <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> themselves to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3318>Get<s%> you out, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H7272>follow<s%> you: and <S%H310>after<s%> that I will <S%H3318>go<s%> out. And he <S%H3318>went<s%> out from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> in a <S%H2750>great<s%> <S%H639>anger.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> shall not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to you; that my <S%H4159>wonders<s%> may be <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4159>wonders<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> so that he would not let the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> out of his <S%H776>land.<s%>
